thread.title: Apple withdraws some China apps after malware found - WFIE-TV Evansville
thread.title_full: Apple withdraws some China apps after malware found - WFIE-TV Evansville - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: WFIE-TV Evansville
title: Apple withdraws some China apps after malware found - WFIE-TV Evansville
text:
Apple Inc. has removed some applications from its App Store after developers in China were tricked into using software tools that added malicious code in an unusual security breach. Apple gave no details of which companies were affected.
 WFIE-TV Evansville.
